column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday January 14 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Tates Creek Rd at Rockbridge Dr:
column4: The entire intersection is shutdown until further notice due to a Police incident.

column3: Traffic Alert for Tates Creek Rd at Rockbridge Dr:
column4: Outbound traffic detoured to Clearwater Way.  Inbound traffic should use Kenesaw Dr.
